Q1
```{r}
ggplot(qb_revenue_breakdown, 
       aes(x = Year,
           y = Revenue,
                         fill = Product)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```
Q2
```{r}
qb_monthly_sales %>% 
  filter(Cashflow == "Kwikbit Unit 1 Sales") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = Amount, colour = Cashflow)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()

```
Q3
```{r}
qb_monthly_sales %>% 
  filter(Date > "2019-01-01") %>% 
  filter(Cashflow == "Total Revenue", Cashflow == "Cost") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = Amount, colour = Cashflow)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()

```
